name: HENTAI SAVES AUSTRALIA
description:
Hentai saves Australia - the game that will make Australia moist again, it’s not just for your groin, it's for Australia, it’s for koala, to be honest, it’s the game that changes EVERYTHING, love memes? Do you like Hentai? do you want to be a part of the MEM game that saves everything? Ohhh yeah, you do. Then you just have to help Hentai save Australia, I repeat help HENTAI SAVE AUSTRALIA!!! !!

Hentai saves Australia - The puzzle game for Australia, in which all you need is to swap bricks and restore pictures in order to make Australia moist again.
But please remember, this game is aiming to help Australia wildlife and make you relax and enjoy life.

So if you cannot get relaxed, you may try “Straya Mode”.

Straya Mode

Keyboard C: Complete Level

Game Features
Artworks
Australian Flag
Achievements
Relaxing music

All jokes aside we will be donating money to Hunter Wildlife Rescue (Native Animal Trust Fund) and uploading a video. <3

Regardless of if you buy the game please support larger charities like WWF if you can: https://www.wwf.org.au/get-involved/bushfire-emergency
